lemma AStore_correct: assumes wf: "wf_prog wt P" assumes meth: "P \<turnstile> C sees M:Ts\<rightarrow>T=\<lfloor>(mxs,mxl\<^sub>0,ins,xt)\<rfloor> in C" assumes ins: "ins!pc = AStore" assumes wt: "P,T,mxs,size ins,xt \<turnstile> ins!pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M" assumes conf: "\<Phi> \<turnstile> t: (None, h, (stk,loc,C,M,pc)#frs)\<surd>" assumes no_x: "(tas, \<sigma>) \<in> exec_instr (ins!pc) P t h stk loc C M pc frs" shows "\<Phi> \<turnstile> t: \<sigma> \<surd>"
